statements: DELETE FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value < 20;
DELETE FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE log_id = 200 AND equipment_id = 150;
DELETE FROM Downtime_Records WHERE equipment_id = 1001 AND downtime_start < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE schedule_id = 500 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive'
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 10 AND maintenance_date < '2021-08-20';
DELETE FROM downtime_records WHERE equipment_id = 201 AND downtime_reason = 'Machine malfunction'
DELETE FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND location = 'Room A';
